subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Protected by two bodyguards as he walked on the court, Andy Ram of Israel finally played in Dubai. He lost a doubles match a week after Shahar Peer of Israel was denied a visa for the women’s tournament.
snippet: Protected by two bodyguards as he walked on the court, Andy Ram of Israel finally played in Dubai. He lost a doubles match a week after Shahar Peer of Israel was denied a visa for the women’s tournament.
